name: Basketball Duel
description:
Basketball Duel is a unique and addictive conversion of the classical arcade Basketball Tabletop game for mobile tablets.

Challenge your friends to a face to face Duel on the same device or practice against the AI and then beat your friends.

This fast and competitive game will test your reflexes and concentration to the highest degree. Can you prevail in this Basketball Duel?

Gorgeous 3D graphics, fast paced action and competitive gameplay for two simultaneous players make this game the best digitized Tabletop Basketball experience out there.

Features
• Play with friends on the same device, or practice against 2 levels of AI.
• Classical Single game mode.
• Tournament mode, with up to five continuous matches, for the maximum experience.
• Training mode, practice against 2 levels of AI.
• The game to play for parties or social events.
• Realistic Physics.
• Unique graphics.
• Easy to learn but difficult to master, truly captures the experience of the real retro Tabletop Basketball arcades.
• Gameplay is fine tuned for an intense Basketball Duel.

Basketball Duel is best Played on Tablets or above 6 inch Phones.

Note: If want to test out before buying there is also a Lite version https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.christopgames.BasketballDuelLite
